titleStmt.title: Die Mercurii, 4. Jan 1642. Whereas many of the trained bands and others, listed under severall colonells and captaines, inhabiting within the Cities of London and Westminster, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Aprill 6. London printed for John Wright, in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: Title from heading and first lines of text.
An order of Parliament for imprisoning such as refuse to serve in the trained bands. With the form of a warrant for the arrest of such persons.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
